column3: Traffic;Siem Reap: At 05:30 am on October 1
column5: there was a road accident on National Road 6A
column9: between a Rith Mony company bus
column10: Phnom Penh 3C.68585 and a Camry 2A.3083. The 42-year-old male driver of the car
column11: from Kompong Thom named Soeung Kea was killed.------After the incident
column13: and an unknown number of injured passengers were sent to hospital
column14: but the bus driver had already escaped from the scene. ------PKARTHMOR
